Description:
Detects suspicious child processes of the "Manage Engine ServiceDesk Plus" Java web service

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Child Process Of Manage Engine ServiceDesk
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((parent_process_path like '%\manageengine\servicedesk\%' and parent_process_path like '%\java.exe%') and (process_path like '%\appvlp.exe' or process_path like '% ash.exe' or process_path like '% itsadmin.exe' or process_path like '%\calc.exe' or process_path like '%\certutil.exe' or process_path like '%\cscript.exe' or process_path like '%\curl.exe' or process_path like '% orfiles.exe' or process_path like '%\mftrace.exe' or process_path like '%\mshta.exe' or process_path like '%
et.exe' or process_path like '%
et1.exe' or process_path like '%
otepad.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%\query.exe' or process_path like '%eg.exe' or process_path like '%\schtasks.exe' or process_path like '%\scrcons.exe' or process_path like '%\sh.exe' or process_path like '%\systeminfo.exe' or process_path like '%\whoami.exe' or process_path like '%\wmic.exe' or process_path like '%\wscript.exe')) and  not ((process_path like '%
et.exe' or process_path like '%
et1.exe') and command like '% stop%'))
